Author: coolcat411
Text: I tried to start meditating earlier this year and mostly ended up dissociating during sessions, but within the last couple of weeks I’ve been trying to practice mindfulness and noticed a HUGE difference in my attitude and general well-being. I think that if you find a style or approach that can fit you and what you’re looking to achieve, it can do wonders for you. I’m happy you’re finding it useful, love!!
